abstract: Christopher Clarey On Global Sports column notes that epidemic of doping among Kenyan runners has hurt country's credibility in sport as well as national pride; urges Kenyan officials to protect country's legacy of international track and field champions by establishing rigorous testing programs.
lead_paragraph: Kenyans swept the men’s 3,000-meter steeplechase at the world track and field championships on Monday, but allegations of doping are said to be taking a toll on national pride.

headline.main: Atop Medal Table at Worlds, Kenya Is Also Under a Cloud
headline.print_headline: Atop Medal Table at Worlds, Kenya Is Also Under a Cloud

snippet: Kenyans swept the men’s 3,000-meter steeplechase at the world track and field championships on Monday, but allegations of doping are said to be taking a toll on national pride.
